intension: Create a flyer for a Black Friday sale at the Lokky Shop, featuring balloons to convey a festive and joyful atmosphere. The sale takes place from November 20-23 in stores only at 602 Riverside Park Rd, Deming.
globalcaption: The image features a black and white advertisement for a Black Friday sale. The advertisement is promoting a 20% discount on all items. The image is composed of four different pictures, each showcasing a unique item. The items include a pair of scissors, a tie, a pair of shoes, and a handbag. The advertisement is visually appealing and effectively highlights the sale's offerings.
keywords: black friday, blackfriday, discount, sale, holiday, offer, event, retail, promotion, price, commerce, black, balloons, flyer

bglayer.bgcaption: The image is a black and white photograph of a dark sky. The sky is cloudy and appears to be nighttime, as there is no visible sunlight. The darkness of the sky contrasts with the black background, creating a striking visual effect

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a pair of brown shoes placed on a white background. The shoes are positioned on the left side of the image. Next to the shoes, there is a black helmet, which is a part of a motorcycle rider's gear. The helmet is placed on the right side of the image. Additionally, there is a pair of scissors located in the middle of the image, slightly above the shoes
